snippet.title: Harold's Walk (2024)
snippet.description:
Harold's Walk (2024) is a PC port/remaster of the original Harold's Walk game from December 2020 on the Nintendo 3ds.

To help support this game and other titles by the same developer (me) please consider sharing this trailer and wishlisting the game on Steam.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1009360/Harolds_Walk/
